name: Survival In Chaos
description:
Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 entry.

(If the web version is laggy, you can try the pc version)

Genre: 2d, Hyper-Casual, Endless Survival, Action.
Environment: Dungeon
Goal: Survive.

The player is an adventurer who was captured by the enemies inside a dungeon. To entertain themselves and execute the player, the enemy executioner will throw orbs at the player. The player can't move from his spot. However, he is given guns to fight for his life and entertain them more. Can the player survive?

Note: This is the prototype of the actual game. I might finish the game later.
